snippet.title: NYC Links Drop In Foodborne Illness To Grades
snippet.description:
NYC Links Drop In Foodborne Illness To Grades
By The Associated Press 04:32 PM EST 03/06/12
NYC says data show salmonella infections down in 1st year of restaurant letter grades
http://www.thestreet.com/story/11446135/1/nyc-links-drop-in-foodborne-illness-to-grades.html

snippet.title: Makings of Salmonella Egg Scare Began in 2008
snippet.description:
Makings of Salmonella Egg Scare Began in 2008
By Andrea Tse 10:25 AM EDT 09/15/10
A House committee letter to Wright County Egg asking the owner Austin DeCoster to address questions about disturbing environmental sample results indicated that the company tested positive for salmonella on multiple occasions between 2008 and 2010.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/10839497/1/makings-of-salmonella-egg-scare-began-in-2008.html

snippet.title: P&G Recalls More Pet Food
snippet.description:
